quote.author: Albert Einstein
quote.body: Everything should be as simple as possible, but not simpler.

quote.author: John Lennon
quote.body: When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down "Happy." They told me I didn't understand the assignment and I told them they didn't understand life.

quote.author: Nelson Mandela
quote.body: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

quote.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quote.body: Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes.

quote.author: Steve Jobs
quote.body: If today were the last day of your life, would you want to do what you are about to do today?
